name: Cetafhil oily skin cleanser 125ml
information: Discover a breakthrough in skincare with Cetaphil Oily Skin Cleanser. This 125ml cleanser is specially formulated for oily and acne-prone skin, effectively cleansing without over-drying .

information: Clinically Proven Efficacy Our Hair Regrowth Serum has undergone extensive safety and efficacy studies over the past four years, delivering results that exceed expectations. name: CETAPHIL MOISTURISING Cream 250gm
information: CETAPHIL MOISTURISING Cream is non-comedogenic, meaning it won't clog pores. This feature specially beneficial for those prone to acne or breakouts.The quick absorption technology makes this cream an ideal base for makeup application, creating a smooth canvas for flawless makeup.

name: Dr. Willmar Schwabe Biofungin Syrup 250 ml
information: Dr. Willmar Schwabe Biofungin Syrup 250 ml is a natural and effective nutritional supplement designed to support overall health and well-being. This syrup is formulated with a potent blend of biofungin, a unique combination of essential nutrients and minerals that are beneficial for boosting the immune system and promoting vitality.

name: Episoft AC Cream 75gm
information: Episoft AC Cream 75gm is a specialized dermatologically tested cream designed to address acne-prone skin. Formulated with clinically proven ingredients, this cream helps in managing acne, reducing inflammation, and preventing future breakouts. The gentle formula is suitable for all skin types and helps in maintaining a clear and healthy complexion.
